BrowserCMS

BrowserCMS is a general purpose, open source Web Content Management System (CMS), written in Ruby on Rails. This is the API documentation for v3.0.0.

Getting Started (Short Version)

Need SQLite3 and Rails 2.3.2 (or later). 

    sudo gem install browsercms
    rails my_new_project_name -m http://github.com/browsermedia/browsercms/raw/master/templates/demo.rb
    cd my_new_project_name
    script/server

    Go to http://localhost:3000/cms and log in as cmsadmin/cmsadmin.

Getting Started (Long Version)

See the Getting Started guide (browsercms.org/doc/guides/html/getting_started.html) for how to install and start a BrowserCMS project.

[Validate]
